leaflet.constituency: Bury St Edmunds, Stowmarket, Needham Market and the Villages

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reversing the NI increase for lowest earners, restoring the link to earnings benefiting every pensioner.
Immediate action to tackle the appalling deficit, a guaranteed NHS budget but less bureaucracy.
An annual limit on any new immigration.
Lower inheritance tax by the end of the Parliament.
An end to early release of offenders.
Powers repatriated from Brussels to Westminster.

issues.brexitEurope: Powers repatriated from Brussels to Westminster.
issues.economy: Fairer taxes, reversing the NI increase for lowest earners.
issues.governance: Lower inheritance tax by the end of the Parliament.
issues.health: Immediate action to tackle the appalling deficit, a guaranteed NHS budget but less bureaucracy.
issues.immigration: An annual limit on any new immigration.
issues.socialWelfare: Restoring the link to earnings benefiting every pensioner.

contactInformation.address: 10 Woolpit Business Park, Bury St Edmunds, IP30 9UP
